name: The Infected Survival
description:
https://theinfectedsurvival.web.app/  click here

Story

A mercenary was prayed to inspect a city.

It appears that there are only zombies in the city.

and had to be unlucky because the car was running out of fuel

therefore have to survive from that city 

How To play

clear the mission and go to the end of map to go next map

WASD Walk

Spacebar Jump

L-Click Fire

E Action

F Pick Up

L-Shift Run

Z Use Item
